result.reason: When closing a tab, focus jumps to the next tab by position instead of returning to the previously active tab (MRU order), which breaks multi-session workflows.
result.approach: Track tab activation history in a stack/MRU list in ConnectionWindow; on tab close, pop the stack and activate the previous tab instead of the positionally adjacent one.
